llm_res.rule: MUST trigger on any successful call to approve(address _spender, uint256 _value).
The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.

The `balanceOf` function must return the actual balance of the token type `id` owned by `account`. The balance must not be manipulated or altered in any way that does not reflect the true state of the balance within the contract.
